2.0.2

  • Fixes an issue where properties with the initial keyword were being merged (thanks to @holmari).

2.0.1

  • Fixed a crash when the module was trying to retrieve declarations from a rule which contained comments in it.

2.0.0

  • Upgraded to PostCSS 5.

1.0.2

  • Fixes an issue where properties with the inherit keyword were being merged.

1.0.1

  • Fixes an issue where calc values were being mangled.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
